name: Wiipay - Crypto Blockchain Exchange Wallet Mobile App UI UX Design UI Kit

Free sample and design preview for personal use only.

Most of the screens have been flattened and detached for preview, while the 100% editable designs + design system can be found on my UI8.net, you can go there. Get access to premium, high-quality designs, and commercial use purposes by purchasing my product at the given link.

 

--------------------------------------------------------

 

Wiipay - Crypto Blockchain Exchange Wallet Mobile App UI UX Design UI Kit, has 55+ pixel-perfect screens and is easy to use in Figma.

 

Product Highlights:

  • 55+ Pixel-Perfect Screens (iOS/Android Support)
  • 100% Editable & Customizable
  • Compatibility: Figma
  • Light & Dark Theme Included
  • Including Global Color, Font Styles, Dynamic Components & Variants
  • Design System & 20+ of Components
  • Fully Auto Layout
  • Well Organized Layers System
  • Unique, Stylish & Modern
  • Used Grid System
  • Pixel Perfect Design
  • Global Style Guide
  • Easily Drag & Drop Design

 

Note: All images/photos inside & mockup design in the preview are included.
